name: Water Slide Bike Racing
description:
Get ready for a big water sliding splash in this summer season and enjoy yourself!!


Play the world's best popular Water Slide Bike Racing !!




How To Play:

- Tilt to steer your water bike
- Don't hit or collide any obstacles
- Collect all coins to get extra bonus
- Unlock more water bikes
- Upgrade your water bikes



Game Play Modes:


- Career
- Race




Features:

- HD Graphics
- 3D Environment
- Heavy Sound System
- 3D camera views
- Easy to play and install
- Plenty of challenging levels
